website_summaries.verdict: A moisturizing bodywash that keeps skin soft and clean with no residue left behind.
pros: Locks in moisture for hydrated skin
cons: Some feel that the scent doesn't match what is promised

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: This is a fake. Barely had any smell and most definitely doesn't smell anything like the samples from the hotel. Returning. At that price buy straight from manufacturer's website
customer_reviews.author: Charlie S.

customer_reviews.title: Fraudulent Product
customer_reviews.text: I have generally had good experience with Amazon beauty products, and have never in my life written an Amazon review before, but as a longtime user to Malin + Goetz products, i can promise this is a fake product. The scent, consistency and bottle are all off. I tried to refund the product and am now denying on my credit card bill. Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the same stuff you see in hotels
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was ordering the same bodywash I found in a hotel in Jackson, WY, but this smells different and not nearly as strongly. It's completely different. Upon further examination, the stuff I liked in the hotel was 12% rum perfume. This is 0.5%. Will not be buying more until M+G releases the same formula they sell to hotels to the public. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: guerrieraspirant

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely fake
customer_reviews.text: I had the real gel before & then purchased this one. I was in the shower a few days later after the original one was finished & this one just didn't smell like the old one & didn't have the scent at all. I questioned it a couple days until I came back to amazon & saw other people had posted the same. This is definitely a fake product. They've filled it with some generic shower gel & it's awful. I poured it all out. Really folk, don't buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Something seems wrong... will try one more time for Prime Day.
customer_reviews.text: When I got this I knew something didn't smell right — not nearly as amazing as the smaller bottles I’ve bought and used in the past. Seeing hear a lot of reviewers thing this is fake. Will try one more time...
customer_reviews.author: BCS

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: We bought this after using a hotel set. We had loved the smell of it. I’m not sure if it’s the change in elevation or the difference in the amount/size of bottle, but it doesn’t smell the same. Both my husband and I had the same thought and were disappointed. It’s still a nice unusual body wash, but I’m not certain if we will be ordering a second bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany J. Wyse

customer_reviews.title: JUst oK
customer_reviews.text: Scent not strong enough. Will order from the merchant next time.
customer_reviews.author: Funderburk Books & Such

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money. A let down.
customer_reviews.text: It's a thick consistency. Smells okay. Not much like dark rum though. It just smells sweet. It doesn't longer on my body after use at all. I will not be spending my money on the expensive Malin + Goetz products again.
customer_reviews.author: M. Parrott

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product change from previous version
customer_reviews.text: They completely changed the formula and this NO LONGER smells anything like the previous Rum version. It smells like some generic scented soap you find in a public restroom. I had read they made a change, but had no idea it was this drastic. Honestly have no idea why they would continue to sell it under the same Rum name. If they made the change to save money, they made a terrible choice as I don't see why I would possibly buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the product
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. Used it recently on a trip to Kuala Lumpur at the hotel and was so impressed I bought it and the shape and conditioner. Usually hotel shampoos only work on one type of hair texture but this product especially the conditioer does just that conditions and detangles wonderfully. Its great to use especially since I swim almost every day. Body wash is gentle and smells really fresh. I have all sorts of allergies and find that other washes burn when I use them. This one is great!!
customer_reviews.author: sholder

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I first discovered this body wash when I was staying in a hotel in Asbury Park, NJ. The body wash there had 1.5% dark rum in it, and smelled so much better than this .5% dark rum body wash. It’s not the same. I bought it because of what I used in the hotel. I’m severely disappointed, especially since the price on these are up there.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Rum fragrance is luxurious
customer_reviews.text: Discovered malin + goetz at the 21C in Louisville. The rum soap had an amazing fragrance. I keep it as a hand soap in my master bath. It is luxurious.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Either fake or Malin is selling unscented crap. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Owlsgone

customer_reviews.title: Great smelling body wash
customer_reviews.text: This is really a nice body wash. The Dark Rum scent is very pleasing. My only gripe is the cost. But it's a luxury I am willing to get.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery R. Akin

customer_reviews.title: Beware Fake Products on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I believe this to be a counterfeit product. I’ve compared it to the real one I bought earlier this year and the packaging and smell are very different. It’s body wash, it just isn’t the real thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Scent is wrong
customer_reviews.text: The smell is completely off. Amazon must have old/expired inventory, will be ordering directly from the website from now on. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Incandenza

customer_reviews.title: Not the same scent as previous Malin-Goetze Rum body wash used in the past
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shower gel in January and just started using it this month. I have used the rum scented body wash many times in the past. The scent for this product was not what I had received in the past. I'm wondering if it was a knock-off?
customer_reviews.author: Michael l Wolf

customer_reviews.title: product scent no longer the same
customer_reviews.text: either it’s a fake or malin+goetz changed the scent . either way, it’s not the same as it was as recently as 2018 which is the last time i purchased the product and was totally in love with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kali Ma

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: I love the everlasting smell it leaves on your body! Also it lathered very nicely
customer_reviews.author: S. Cardillo

customer_reviews.title: Product came without seal, open in packaging and leaking.
customer_reviews.text: I love Malin + Goetz products, but this is absurd that I received this product in a package without the safety seal under the cap, leaking in the package and clearly missing some of the product. Not acceptable, Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Boone

customer_reviews.title: Read all the reviews first - unfortunately fake
customer_reviews.text: This is unfortunately fake. As soon you open the box you can tell. I wish I had read the reviews ahead of time.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Plascencia

customer_reviews.title: FAKE!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a FAKE. Do not buy. Smells nothing like the real thing.
customer_reviews.author: Philippa

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC!
customer_reviews.text: Tried this in a hotel in Maine and fell in love with the clean, fresh feeling AND THE SCENT! It's awesome! highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: mykidsdad

customer_reviews.title: A very good product!
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find good products for sensitive skin - this is!
customer_reviews.author: Philip Segal

customer_reviews.title: Perhaps order from seller directly
customer_reviews.text: The product must have been old or not stored under proper conditions. It does not have the proper smell
customer_reviews.author: Mark S. Wittman

customer_reviews.title: Product has changed
customer_reviews.text: They changed the scent of the rum body wash and now call it hand and body wash. It’s not nearly as good smelling
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impostor
customer_reviews.text: I've used this same stuff for a few years now, but this isn't the real thing. But -- An Impostor! --seriously though, yeah, this is unfortunately deluded or a clever fraud.
customer_reviews.author: Brutus Jones

customer_reviews.title: Smells Incredible!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love! Use as a hand soap in my bathroom. Guests constantly compliment the scent and ask what’s the brand and fragrance. Super fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived w/ open security cap and leaking....lost maybe 10 % of volume.
customer_reviews.author: Scott W.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fragrance.
customer_reviews.text: I love this body wash and would buy it more often if it wasn’t so expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Sheridann Biddle

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: Got the real thing a couple times, then they dropped a fake on me..
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Blomster

customer_reviews.title: Fake Peoduct
customer_reviews.text: Fake product. Smelled terrible and not even close to the orginal scent.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE- it’s a fake.
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a fake. The bottle to the left I bought direct... this one on the right (this purchase) has smudged labeling in monochrome.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: I tried this body wash at a $500/night hotel in ...
customer_reviews.text: I tried this body wash at a $500/night hotel in New York and have never gone back. If God used body wash this would be it.
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: Smells great but too expensive
customer_reviews.text: I went to a hotel in Phoenix Arizona that had this in their shower. The smell was amazing and it's still the best scent I've come across. Only downfall is the insane price tag for such a small amount. Don't know if I'll buy again because it breaks the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: eh. smelled better.
customer_reviews.text: love the bergamot, not so keen on the rum. it doesn't smell like rum, but more of a cheap pina colada. of course, this is just personally prefference - so, i am marking it as just ok. Their other stuff is great.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Lepard

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: didn't smell like the ones you get in Delta SkyClub.
customer_reviews.author: Andi

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Scent!
customer_reviews.text: Far and away my absolute favorite! I use it as a hand soap given it’s so pricey. I love the scent and a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: gina

product_meta.title: Malin + Goetz Rum Hand + Body Wash — cleansing, purifying, hydrating women and men’s hand + body wash. for all skin types, even sensitive. No stripping or irritation. Cruelty-free + vegan 16 Fl oz
product_meta.description:
Our gentle, everyday Rum body wash balances natural glycerin with amino acid technology to hydrate and purify skin. Scented with our best-selling Dark Rum fragrance. We’re excited to let you know we’re in the process of going back to our roots. We’re making a return to single-color packaging design we launched MALIN+GOETZ with 15 years ago. Don’t worry… the formulas you know + love will remain the same.

BRAND STORY
malin+goetz simple skincare solution

BRAND_DESCRIPTION
Malin + Goetz combines natural ingredients with advanced technology to create uncomplicated skincare. Our products are gentle and effective for all skin types and genders. Made locally in New York and cruelty-free.

See more
